caseTitle: Azra Bibi v. General Manager, Personnel (CPO), Pakistan Railways HQ, Lahore & others
tagline: (1). Discussion on Section 2 (b) of Civil Servants Act, 1973, Section 2 (a) and Section 4 of the Service Tribunals Act, 1973. (2). Legal maxim “actio personalis moritur cum persona” (personal right to an action dies with the person). (3). Order XXII, Rule 1, C.P.C. Conditions of impleading legal heirs in the Service Appeal.
